recap_documents.description: OPINION and ORDER issued in that the Motion to Dismiss filed by Defendant FirstEnergy Corp. 160 is GRANTED IN PART as to the non-management Director Defendants in Count IV only and is DENIED in all other respects. Defendant Pines Motion to Dismiss 166 is GRANTED IN PART as to Count II and is DENIED IN PART as to Count I. The remaining Motions to Dismiss filed by Defendant Reffner 162, Defendant Judge 164, Defendant Dowling 165, Defendant Chack 168, Defendant Schneider 170, the Underwriter Defendants 171, Defendant Vespoli 172, and Defendant Jones 174 each are DENIED. The partial dismissals are without prejudice. Signed by Chief Judge Algenon L. Marbley on 3/7/22. Associated Cases: 2:20-cv-03785-ALM-KAJ, 2:20-cv-04287-ALM-KAJ (sem) (Entered: 03/07/2022)

recap_documents.description: NOTICE OF FILING OF OFFICIAL TRANSCRIPT of STATUS CONFERENCE Proceedings (Vol. 2 of 2) held on 7/13/2023 before Judge Henry T. Wingate. Court Reporter/Transcriber Teri Norton, Telephone Number : 601-608-4186, E-mail : teri_norton@mssd.uscourts.gov. NOTICE RE : REDACTION OF TRANSCRIPTS: The parties have seven (7) calendar days to file with the Court a Notice of Intent to Request Redaction of this transcript. If no Notice is filed, the transcript will be made electronically available to the public without redaction after 90 calendar days. The policy is located on the court website at www.mssd.uscourts.gov. Transcript may be viewed at the court public terminal or purchased through the Court Reporter/Transcriber before the deadline for Release of Transcript Restriction. After that date it may be obtained through PACER. Redaction Request due 8/16/2023. Redacted Transcript Deadline set for 8/28/2023. Release of Transcript Restriction set for 10/24/2023. (TN) (Entered: 07/26/2023)
